subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Maurice Clarett, who led Ohio State to the 2002 national title, asked a judge in Columbus, Ohio, for permission to try out with the Omaha Nighthawks of the United Football League.
snippet: Maurice Clarett, who led Ohio State to the 2002 national title, asked a judge in Columbus, Ohio, for permission to try out with the Omaha Nighthawks of the United Football League.
